name: Quest: Buy Bananas!
description:
You have been given a simple quest that you must finish: buy bananas!

The first game posted by Neophytic Novice. All the graphics and audio are original. Please consider using your time to play it!

Note: If you do not have a Run Time Package (RTP) installed, download it to let the game run. A download is placed above but you can also find it here (Select RPG MAKER XP): http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

An anti-lag script by Boris "Blizzard" Mikic was used.

Credit: Blizz-ABS Event Anti-Lag (ABSEAL) licensed under BSD License 2.0 Copyright (c) Boris "Blizzard" Mikic.
